GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/s.description: Returns details of all sessions of an organization.

parameters.description: The page number from which you want your page search results to be displayed.
parameters.name: page_no

parameters.description: Number of results per page
parameters.name: per_page

parameters.description: The start time range for which you want to retrieve the meetings. The time must be specified in ISO format.
parameters.name: start_time

parameters.description: The end time range for which you want to retrieve the meetings. The time must be specified in ISO format.
parameters.name: end_time

parameters.description: Search string that matches sessions based on meeting title, meeting ID, and session ID
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: ID of the meeting that sessions should be associated with
parameters.name: associated_id

associated_id.description: ID of the meeting this session is associated with. In the case of V2 meetings, it is always a UUID. In V1 meetings, it is a room name of the form `abcdef-ghijkl`

live_participants.description: number of participants currently in the session

max_concurrent_participants.description: number of maximum participants that were in the session

meeting_display_name.description: Title of the meeting this session belongs to

minutes_consumed.description: number of minutes consumed since the session started

organization_id.description: Organization id that hosted this session

updated_at.description: timestamp when session was last updated

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/s.summary: Fetch all sessions of an organization

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/s.description: Returns data of the given session ID including recording details.

parameters.description: List all breakout rooms
parameters.name: include_breakout_rooms

parameters.description: ID of the session
parameters.name: session_id

associated_id.description: ID of the meeting this session is associated with. In the case of V2 meetings, it is always a UUID. In V1 meetings, it is a room name of the form `abcdef-ghijkl`

live_participants.description: number of participants currently in the session

max_concurrent_participants.description: number of maximum participants that were in the session

meeting_display_name.description: Title of the meeting this session belongs to

minutes_consumed.description: number of minutes consumed since the session started

organization_id.description: Organization id that hosted this session

updated_at.description: timestamp when session was last updated

200.description: Get details about a particular session

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/s.description: Returns a URL to download all chat messages of the session ID in CSV format.

parameters.description: ID of the session
parameters.name: session_id

chat_download_url.description: URL where the chat logs can be downloaded

chat_download_url_expiry.description: Time when the download URL will expire

200.description: Returns all chat messages of a session.

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/s.summary: Fetch all chat messages of a session

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/s.description: Returns a list of participants for the given session ID.

parameters.description: The search query string. You can search using the meeting ID or title.
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: The page number from which you want your page search results to be displayed.
parameters.name: page_no

parameters.description: Number of results per page
parameters.name: per_page

parameters.description: if true, response includes all the peer events of participants.
parameters.name: include_peer_events

parameters.description: In breakout room sessions, the view parameter can be set to `raw` for session specific duration for participants or `consolidated` to accumulate breakout room durations.
parameters.name: view

parameters.description: ID of the session
parameters.name: session_id

ParticipantListSuccess.summary: success response for session's participants list

ParticipantListWithPeerStatsSuccess.summary: success response for sessions participants list with peer events

created_at.description: timestamp when this participant was created.

custom_participant_id.description: ID passed by client to create this participant.

display_name.description: Display name of participant when joining the session.

duration.description: number of minutes for which the participant was in the session.

id.description: Participant ID. This maps to the corresponding peerId.

joined_at.description: timestamp at which participant joined the session.

left_at.description: timestamp at which participant left the session.

preset_name.description: Name of the preset associated with the participant.

updated_at.description: timestamp when this participant's data was last updated.

200.description: Get participants list of a particular session

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/s.summary: Fetch participants list of a session

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/s.description: Returns details of the given participant ID along with call statistics for the given session ID.

parameters.description: Comma separated list of filters to apply. Note that there must be no spaces between the filters.
parameters.name: filters

parameters.description: if true, response includes all the peer events of participant.
parameters.name: include_peer_events

parameters.description: ID of the participant
parameters.name: participant_id

parameters.description: ID of the session
parameters.name: session_id

created_at.description: timestamp when this participant was created.

custom_participant_id.description: ID passed by client to create this participant.

display_name.description: Display name of participant when joining the session.

duration.description: number of minutes for which the participant was in the session.

id.description: Participant ID. This maps to the corresponding peerId.

joined_at.description: timestamp at which participant joined the session.

left_at.description: timestamp at which participant left the session.

preset_name.description: Name of the preset associated with the participant.

updated_at.description: timestamp when this participant's data was last updated.

200.description: Returns details of a participant along with callstats data.

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/s.description: Returns a Summary URL to download the Summary of Transcripts for the session ID as plain text.

summaryDownloadUrl.description: URL where the summary of transcripts can be downloaded

summaryDownloadUrlExpiry.description: Time of Expiry before when you need to download the csv file.

200.description: Returns a complete summary of transcripts of a session.

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/s.summary: Fetch summary of transcripts for a session

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/s.description: Returns a URL to download the transcript for the session ID in CSV format.

parameters.description: ID of the session
parameters.name: session_id

transcript_download_url.description: URL where the transcript can be downloaded

transcript_download_url_expiry.description: Time when the download URL will expire

200.description: Returns the complete transcript of a session.

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/s.summary: Fetch the complete transcript for a session

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/s.description: Returns details of the given peer ID along with call statistics for the given session ID.

parameters.description: Comma separated list of filters to apply. Note that there must be no spaces between the filters.
parameters.name: filters

parameters.description: ID of the peer
parameters.name: peer_id

200.description: Returns details of a participant (using peer id) along with callstats data.

POST /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/.description: Trigger Summary generation of Transcripts for the session ID.
POST /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/.summary: Generate summary of Transcripts for the session
